findings.title: Inconsistent TokenType Enum Between YOLO And TransferManager
findings.description: The current implementation has an inconsistency in the TokenType enum definitions between YOLO and TransferManager that needs to be resolved.

findings.title: Revisited YOLO Cancellation Logic
findings.description: The cutoff time logic in `_deposit()` and `_cancel()` functions may cause conflicts, suggesting to ensure cancellation can only occur after the cutoff time.

findings.title: Possible Miscalculation of Owned Protocol Fee
findings.description: The `getClaimPrizesPaymentRequired()` function does not validate whether the given arguments have any duplicate rounds or prize indexes, which may lead to miscalculated payment amounts.

findings.title: Trust Issue of Admin Keys
findings.description: In the YOLO protocol, there is a privileged owner account that plays a critical role in governing and regulating the protocol-wide operations.
